verses.verse: Now <WG1161> as touching <WG4012> things offered <WG1494> to idols, <WG1494> we know <WG1492> that we all <WG3956> have <WG2192> knowledge. <WG1108> Knowledge <WG1108> puffs <WG5448> up, but charity <WG26> edifies. <WG3618>
And if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man think <WG1380> that he knows <WG1492> any <WG5100> thing, he knows <WG1097> nothing <WG3762> yet <WG3764> as he ought <WG1163> to know. <WG1097>
But if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man love <WG25> God, <WG2316> the same <WG3778> is known <WG1097> of him.

As concerning <WG4012> therefore <WG3767> the eating <WG1035> of those <WG3588> things that are offered <WG1494> in sacrifice <WG1494> to idols, <WG1494> we know <WG1492> that an idol <WG1497> is nothing <WG3762> in the world, <WG2889> and that there is none <WG3762> other <WG2087> God <WG2316> but one. <WG1520>

For though <WG1512> there be that are called <WG3004> gods, <WG2316> whether <WG1535> in heaven <WG3772> or <WG1535> in earth, <WG1093> (as there be gods <WG2316> many, <WG4183> and lords <WG2962> many, <WG4183>)

But to us there is but one <WG1520> God, <WG2316> the Father, <WG3962> of whom <WG3739> are all <WG3956> things, and we in him; and one <WG1520> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> by whom <WG3739> are all <WG3956> things, and we by him.

However, <WG235> there is not in every <WG3956> man <WG3956> that knowledge: <WG1108> for some <WG5100> with conscience <WG4893> of the idol <WG1497> to this <WG737> hour <WG737> eat <WG2068> it as a thing offered <WG1494> to an idol; <WG1494> and their conscience <WG4893> being <WG5607> weak <WG772> is defiled. <WG3435>

But meat <WG1033> commends <WG3936> us not to God: <WG2316> for neither, <WG3777> if <WG1437> we eat, <WG5315> are we the better; <WG4052> neither, <WG3777> if <WG1437> we eat <WG5315> not, are we the worse. <WG5302>
But take heed <WG991> lest <WG3381> by any <WG3381> means <WG4458> this <WG3778> liberty <WG1849> of your's <WG5216> become <WG1096> a stumbling block <WG4348> to them that are weak. <WG770>

For if <WG1437> any <WG5100> man see <WG1492> you which <WG3588> have <WG2192> knowledge <WG1108> sit <WG2621> at <WG2621> meat in the idol's <WG1493> temple, shall not the conscience <WG4893> of him which is weak <WG772> be emboldened <WG3618> to eat <WG2068> those <WG3588> things which are offered <WG1494> to idols; <WG1494>
And through <WG1909> your knowledge <WG1108> shall the weak <WG770> brother <WG80> perish, <WG622> for whom <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> died? <WG599>
But when you sin <WG264> so <WG3779> against <WG1519> the brothers, <WG80> and wound <WG5180> their weak <WG770> conscience, <WG4893> you sin <WG264> against <WG1519> Christ. <WG5547>

Why, <WG1355> if <WG1487> meat <WG1033> make <WG4624> my brother <WG80> to offend, <WG4624> I will eat <WG5315> no <WG3364> flesh <WG2907> while the world <WG165> stands, lest <WG2443> <WG3361> I make <WG4624> my brother <WG80> to offend. <WG4624>
